name: Pyramid Solitaire - Egypt
description:
Pyramid Solitaire - Ancient Egypt has been enjoyed over 1 BILLION times! Play solitaire and build spectacular pyramids for the Pharaoh and Queen, all while relaxing under the Egyptian sun.

To play, just clear the board by pairing cards to the value of 13. Kings are special as they can be removed on their own. If you can't see a move, deal 3 more cards from the deck and remove cards all the way up to the top of the pyramid. This matching card game is a wonderful way to wind down after a long day and keeps your mind in peak condition. With beautiful artwork, atmospheric sound effects, animations and intuitive controls you’ll see why this game is a family favorite!

PYRAMID FEATURES:
* Relax with our enchanting theme inspired by the glorious city of Giza in Ancient Egypt.
* Rules so simple they are explained in less than a paragraph!
* Simple touch controls and classic, smooth play.
* Local and global leader boards so you can compare scores with friends and family.
* Atmospheric sound effects.
* Interruption friendly with auto-save and resume.
* A relaxing and interesting game that takes the best of solitaire games including Spider, Klondike and Tri-Peaks Solitaire.

Join millions of players who have described our card game as “a test of mental agility”, “very enjoyable and relaxing”, and even as their “favorite game”. You might have played solitaire, but Pyramid Solitaire – Ancient Egypt is a download not to be missed.
